metadata.title: Glitz 'N Gleam Uncle Sam Top Hat Party Accessory (1 count)
features: INCLUDES: 1 Uncle Sam Top Hat in the package
ONE SIZE FITS MOST - will fit most adults
MADE OF: Soft, plush fabric in red, silver and blue colors with foam on the inside
USE: Fun Novelty Party Hat for a Patriotic Party and 4th of July

CELEBRATE LIFE WITH US: Since 1900 The Beistle Company’s mission has remained the same: to help people around the world celebrate life’s events by creating fun, high quality products using the finest materials
description: *** Beistle Glitz 'N Gleam Uncle Sam Top Hat *** This Sequin-Sheen Foam-Backed Hat features a Red, Blue and Silver combination. It is One Size Fits Most. Wear this fun headpiece to your next Patriotic or July 4th celebration! *** Party Planning Made Fun ***From New Year’s Eve Parties, Halloween and Fall Festivities, Bachelorette Parties, Birthday Bashes, Graduation Get-Togethers, Baby Showers, Pool Parties, and more, our Novelty Items and Party Supplies are sure to add a pop of color and extra spice to any occasion.*** Celebrating life's events - one party at a time ***The Beistle line includes over 8,000 items - products for nearly any event, celebration, or theme imaginable. Since 1900 our mission has remained the same: Create products using the finest materials and to the highest standards. Our customers, products, and employees make us who we are. We are The Beistle Company!

title: Celebrate the Holidays with Beistle - Quality Party Supplies Since 1900!
LED Uncle Sam Patriotic Hat
COSLAND Baby 4th of July Kids Uncle Sam Hat
